sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Related list no primary job query test</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[function updateUserWithEmptyEmpDate(){ var grProfile = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_profile'); grProfile.addEncodedQuery('user.active=true^RLQUERYsn_hr_core_job.hr_profile,=0^primary=true^ENDRLQUERY'); grProfile.query(); while (grProfile.next()){ gs.info("Related list query script output ---------------- " + grProfile.user.user_name.toString()); } } updateUserWithEmptyEmpDate();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-08-17 13:25:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>22c6c1762f999110d8a4d5f62799b661</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Related list no primary job query test</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_22c6c1762f999110d8a4d5f62799b661</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-08-18 13:49:04</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Related list no primary job query test
